fr.isima.kyou.dbaccess.mybatis.dao

Interface BasketProductMapper


  • public interface BasketProductMapper
    MyBatis mapper for basketProducts, Sql requests defined in resources inside BasketProductsMapper.xml

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
